text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the Intel Core i9. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GT76 TITAN DT GT76 TITAN DT-039 17.3" Gaming Notebook - 3840 x 2160 - Core i9 i9-9900K - 64 GB RAM - 1 TB HDD - 1 TB SSD - Aluminum Black!
